item.title: Web scraping using BeautifulSoup
item.description: Beautiful Soup is useful for pulling data out of HTML and XML files. It works with html parser to provide idiomatic ways of navigating, searching, and modifying the parse tree. import requests import urllib.request import time from bs4 import BeautifulSoup We can directly get a html document from server url = 'http://quotes.toscrape.com/page/1/' # send a http GET reuest to server and get the response response = requests.get(url) soup = BeautifulSoup(response.
